info.title: Select an option in a listbox popup in interaction mode

setupScript.name: moveFocusToAlabamaInListbox
setupScript.description: expands the Combobox and places focus on 'Alabama' in the listbox popup

user: With focus on an option in the listbox popup, select the focused option.
instructions.raw: With focus on an option in the listbox popup, select the focused option.
instructions.mode: If NVDA did not make the focus mode sound when the test page loaded, press Insert+Space to turn focus mode on.

assertions.expectation: Name of the combobox ('State') is conveyed
State of the combobox (collapsed) is conveyed
Text of the selected option ('Alabama') is conveyed
The ability to enter or edit text is conveyed
The presence of autocomplete behavior is conveyed
